name: Night at forest
description:
Game
Night at forest is a short turn-based survival game, in which the player has to hide from a man hunting it down by using the environment the expansive area around it.

Goal

Goal is to survive all 30 turns without being hunted down.

Controls

Click on the cell to select it. If it is reachable, it will be lit green, if not red. 

To move to the cell press "Move" button, to end the turn press "End Turn" button.
